alert.note: Alert for Northern Panhandle (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 13 at 3:47PM MDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Boundary and northwestern Bonner Counties through 315 PM PDT... At 247 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles southeast of Nordman, or 19 miles northwest of Sandpoint, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Coolin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
